definition: (computer science) macro (primarily Hong Kong and Taiwan)
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Could not allocate memory for a macro table.
sentences.chinese: 此巨集无法配置记忆体。

sentences.english: Basic information about using macros to automate tasks in the editor.
sentences.chinese: 关于在编辑器中使用巨集来自动化工作的基本资讯。

sentences.english: This is a practical approach if you're prepared to redefine the assert macro.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个切实可行的办法如果你是准备重新断言巨集。

sentences.english: Select the final object(s) for your new macro.
sentences.chinese: 为您的新巨集选择最终物体。

sentences.english: Otherwise, it can cause problems when recording new macros.
sentences.chinese: 否则，在录制新巨集时会发生问题。

sentences.english: You can select only one macro at a time to insert into the command line edit box.
sentences.chinese: 您一次只能选取一个巨集，将其插入命令列编辑方块。
这些巨集是不区分大小写的。

sentences.english: Creating new macro projects and modules.
sentences.chinese: 建立新的巨集专案和模组。

sentences.english: Here you can edit the description of the current macro type.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在此编辑目前巨集型态的描述。

sentences.english: Specify the security settings and paths for add-ins and macros.
sentences.chinese: 指定增益集和巨集的安全性设定和路径。

sentences.english: If you prefer, you can move your macros to another module.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢的话，可以将巨集移至另一个模组中。

definition: conversion from simple to traditional Chinese characters
Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
surname Adorno/Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund Adorno 狄奧多·阿多諾|狄奥多·阿多诺[Di2 ao4 duo1 · A1 duo1 nuo4] (1903-1969), German sociologist, philosopher, musicologist, and composer

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)
a Jesuit/member of Society of Jesus
